hanzi-su-wiki:
処

Значения

Место, местожительство; точка, пункт, случай, момент; меры, распоряжения, наказание

Мнемоника

Сокращение. Переносить 欠 столики 几 — необходимый реквизит войска, останавливаясь на бивак. Позднее — просто место.

Варианты

處, 处
purpleculture_pinyin:
chǔ
old variant of 处
старый вариант места
rtega_mnemonic:
處處RS
处处		処place, locale, department, dispose, sentence, punish
  • RS. the sound of the tiger 虍/虎 as it stands up 儿 and walks around 夂 from it's resting place 處 → 処 → 处 (sentenced to life in a zoo)
  • ⓢ person 亻 standing 儿 up from his place and walking 夂 and dispose of something (sentenced to life in prison)
  • ⓢ place where a prophecy 卜 says one goes 夂 to live
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 几 indicates the sound; 夂 (go) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 夂 [ zhǐ ] to go
    • 几 [ jǐ ] small table; how many; a few, some
heisig_story: Both the stretching out of the walking legs and the little bit of wind tucked in on the right suggest using one's legs to kick something out of the way, or dispose of it.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: dispose, manage, deal with, sentence, condemn, act, behave, place
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: распоряжаться, управлять, иметь дело, приговор, осудить, акт, веди, место
koohiiStory1: The best way to dispose of a nasty bit of wind is to let it go and use those walking legs to dissapear. Nobody will ever know it was you.
koohiiStory2: To dispose of rubbish you should walk it to the bin not throw it to the wind.
jp_example_words:
彼処(あそこ): (uk) there, over there, that place, (X) (col) genitals
処置(しょち): treatment
処罰(しょばつ): punishment
処分(しょぶん): disposal, dealing, punishment
其処(そこ): that place, there
其処で(そこで): so (conj), accordingly, now, then, thereupon
其処ら(そこら): everywhere, somewhere, approximately, that area, around there
対処(たいしょ): deal with, cope
処理(しょり): processing, dealing with, treatment, disposition, disposal
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A winter table would be an odd thing to deal with. Winter can be hard to deal with on its own, but turn your table into winter? Just dealing with your food getting cold would be the worst!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look at this winter table. How are you ever going to deal with it? Just think of your favorite warm food and then imagine it getting cold. Deal with it, dog.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This winter table is something you have to deal with, sure, but what if you just gave it to a circus show (しょ)? They like weird stuff like this.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Feel the relief of getting rid of this table. No more having to deal with it anymore. The circus show can have it.
Ru_Meaning: dispose, manage, deal with, sentence, condemn, act, behave, place
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 所 (ところ、ショ место, положение). Этот кандзи также иногда значит "место" — в частности, слова типа 其処 [そこ] чаще пишутся с ним, — однако это не главное значение.
Ru_Words:
処分しょぶん
  • разобраться, завершить дело, наказать, избавиться (от чего-либо)
    • 処理しょり
  • распоряжение чем-л., принятие мер, управление чем-л., ведение дел, обработка
    • 処罰しょばつ
  • наказание, кара, взыскание
    • 処女しょじょ
  • девушка, девственница
    • 其処そこ
  • там
Kanshudo_mnemonic: (things) go (夂) off the table (几) when you deal with them

処字的基本解释

処
chù
同“处”。

処
chǔ
同“处”。

処字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǔ］
［《廣韻》昌與切，上語，昌。］
亦作“処1”。“处1”的繁体字。
(1)居住；居于，处在。
(2)居家不仕，隐居。
(3)指女子居家或未嫁。参见“處女”。
(4)安居；安身。
(5)留，留下。
(6)自居。
(7)停止，止歇。
(8)对待。
(9)相处，交往。
(10)引申为相交往的人，即老朋友。
(11)交，交接；交战。
(12)安顿；安排。
(13)引申为处置，发落。
(14)处罚，惩办。
(15)治理；办理。
(16)指办法。
(17)决断；定夺。
(18)委任，任用。
(19)当，担任；承受。
(20)保持；执持。
(21)主持；执掌。
(22)谋生，维持生活。
(23)审度；辨察。
(24)分别。
(25)成立，建立。参见“處家”。
(26)占，占有。
(27)生病。
(28)享有；据有；取。
(29)筹划，设法；打算，着想。
(30)聚，聚集。
(31)常，定准

処字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【几字部】　処； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页134第05
【唐韻】昌與切【集韻】【韻會】敞呂切，?音杵。【說文】処，止也。从夊，得几而止。【玉篇】與處同。

処字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
処字的起名意思

暂无。

Place
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chǔ]
["Guangyun" Chang and Qi, Shangyu, Chang. ]
Also referred to as "Office 1". Traditional characters of "处1".
(1) To live; to live in, to be present.
(2) Living in seclusion without being an official.
(3) Refers to women who live at home or are unmarried. See "virgin".
(4) Settle down; settle down.
(5) Stay, stay.
(6) Self-proclaimed.
(7) Stop, stop.
(8) Treat.
(9) Get along and associate.
(10) It is extended to people who associate with each other, that is, old friends.
(11) Handover, handover; warring.
(12) Settle; arrange.
(13) The extension refers to disposal and release.
(14) Punishment, punishment.
(15) Governance; handling.
(16) Refers to the method.
(17) Decide; decide.
(18) Appointment, appointment.
(19) Be, serve; accept.
(20) Maintain; hold.
(21) Presiding; taking charge.
(22) Make a living and maintain a living.
(23) Examination; Discernment.
(24) Respectively.
(25) Establishment, establishment. See "Chujia".
(26) Occupy, possess.
(27) Sick.
(28) Enjoy; possess; take.
(29) Planning, trying; planning, thinking.
(30) Gather, gather.
(31) Often, fixed

Name meaning
Nothing.
chǔ, chù
вм. 处
Radicals: 夂, 几  (winter, table)
Meaning Mnemonic
A winter table would be an odd thing to deal with. Winter can be hard to deal with on its own, but turn your table into winter? Just dealing with your food getting cold would be the worst!
Look at this winter table. How are you ever going to deal with it? Just think of your favorite warm food and then imagine it getting cold. Deal with it, dog.
Reading Mnemonic
This winter table is something you have to deal with, sure, but what if you just gave it to a circus show (しょ)? They like weird stuff like this.
Feel the relief of getting rid of this table. No more having to deal with it anymore. The circus show can have it.

几 (стол), 夂 (зима), 攵 (складной стул)
Сравни: 所 (ところ、ショ место, положение). Этот кандзи также иногда значит "место" — в частности, слова типа 其処 [そこ] чаще пишутся с ним, — однако это не главное значение.
処分しょぶん
  • разобраться, завершить дело, наказать, избавиться (от чего-либо)
    • 処理しょり
  • распоряжение чем-л., принятие мер, управление чем-л., ведение дел, обработка
    • 処罰しょばつ
  • наказание, кара, взыскание
    • 処女しょじょ
  • девушка, девственница
    • 其処そこ
  • там
